name: Infinite Runner (TheDarkTurnip)
description: This is a randomly generated endless runner. There are also randomly generated "Boosts" that spawn along the way. By going further, you gain coins, and can spend these coins on "Rescues", used to continue after you die, "Coin Multipliers", which multiply the amount of coins you receive, and "Starting boosts", which will give you a starting boost once a game.
